title: Darkshines
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Passing by, you light up my darkest skies
You'll take only seconds to draw me in
[Pre-Chorus]
So be mine
And your innocence I will consume
[Chorus]
Dark shines
Bringin' me down
Makin' my heart feel sore
'Cause it's good
[Verse 2]
Hold your hands up to your eyes again
Hide from the scary scenes, suppress your fears
[Pre-Chorus]
So be mine
And your innocence I will consume
[Chorus]
Dark shines
Bringin' me down
Makin' my heart feel sore
'Cause it's good
Your dark shines
Bringin' me down
Makin' my heart feel sore
'Cause it's good

[Instrumental Bridge]
[Chorus]
Dark shines
Bringin' me down
Makin' my heart feel sore
'Cause it's good
Ooh, it's good
